Author: jeezy#3408
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator   yes, and thats totally fine.  its also not always a good thing.  if you can code c/c++ and can contribute even more to KMD thats good, but you can also get sidetracked easily and  get  dug up in deep holes for weeks like @dukeleto  usually does, thats were I  come in,  trying  to  provide  as stable as possible nodes with my limited crypto time as possible

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
One question I have and maybe somebody knows.
KMD height.89520 mod.20 VINI.0 myind.2 MINE
when you are the first to sign? the transaction meaning your are VINI.0 does that mean you are the one who started the notarization?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I don't think the data strict knows who was fist to sign, because each node would see that differently due to network latency

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: As soon as your node has all the SIG's it sends the tx, whether u participated or not

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: I see thanks

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: @blackjok3r the `curl -s --url "http://127.0.0.1:7776" --data "{\"agent\":\"dpow\",\"method\":\"active\"}"` command only shows mask for BEER chain right ? do you know what should be added in order to show mask for PIZZA & TXSCLCC ?

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: I tried adding `\"coin\":\""PIZZA"\"` but it doesn't work

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: U can't change the mask unless u recompile iguana with dpows[] with a diff number

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: It defaults to 0

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Which us what ever one u called first

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I guess if u call them in a diff oder on iguana start u can force a diff coin?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: When there is a diff pubkey added

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Or any thing else that may cause node to disagree anything could happen

Author: PHBA2061#2530
Content: sorry the full command is `curl -s --url "http://127.0.0.1:7776" --data "{\"agent\":\"dpow\",\"method\":\"active\"}" | jq -c .[]`    to display the recvmask & bestmask
